Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and Network Watcher to continuously monitor the connectivity of private endpoints. Identify and resolve any connectivity issues promptly.
Ensure DNS settings are correctly configured for private endpoints to resolve private IP addresses. Regularly test DNS resolution to avoid service disruptions.
Audit NSGs associated with private endpoints to ensure proper access controls and security rules are in place. Update rules as needed to maintain security.
Conduct failover tests to verify that private endpoints can handle disruptions and maintain connectivity during failover scenarios.
Review and update security policies related to Azure Private Link to adapt to changes in the network or security landscape.
Conduct regular audits of Azure Private Link configurations to ensure alignment with documented architecture and best practices.
Keep Azure Private Link service documentation up-to-date, including operational procedures, configuration details, and troubleshooting guides.
Perform regular compliance checks to ensure Azure Private Link setup adheres to relevant regulations and industry standards.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential security incidents or Azure Private Link network outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Evaluate the SLA performance of the Azure Private Link connectivity provider. Address any issues or deviations from the agreed SLA metrics.
Develop and execute plans for Azure Private Link upgrades or expansions as needed. Ensure minimal disruption during these activities.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Azure Private Link features, best practices, and security measures.
Regularly back up configurations of private endpoints and associated resources. Ensure secure and accessible storage of backups for potential restoration.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Azure Private Link performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
